b'Halliburton has long been a proud supporter of @kidsmealshouston, a Houston non-profit that delivers meals to preschool aged children. With the pandemic more than doubling the amount of children served in their program, Kids\xe2\x80\x99 Meals needs help more than ever. Check out the different ways that you can help end childhood hunger through Kids\xe2\x80\x99 Meals >> https://halliburtonblog.com/halliburton-supports-kids-meals-to-help-end-childhood-hunger/ #HalliburtonHelps'

b"Halliburton is proud to support the mission of @911day to make the world a better place in remembrance of those lost on 9/11. Today, Halliburton employees volunteered their time at @kidsmealshouston, a non-profit whose mission is to deliver free, healthy meals year-round to the doorsteps of Houston's hungriest preschool-aged children. Let\xe2\x80\x99s #NeverForget what we\xe2\x80\x99re capable of doing together. #HalliburtonHelps #911day"

b'Halliburton donates nearly 1,000 laptops and phones to @aldineschooldistrict and @compudopt to help students with virtual learning.
 
\xe2\x80\x9cThese devices will go straight into the hands of students and be put to good use immediately. Thank you Halliburton for all of your support!\xe2\x80\x9d said Abel Garza, Assistant Superintendent of Community and Governmental Relations, Aldine ISD.
 
\xe2\x80\x9cWe are so thankful for Halliburton\xe2\x80\x99s generosity during this challenging time. These devices will make a huge difference for students without proper access to technology while they are navigating this new world of online school,\xe2\x80\x9d said Colin Dempsey, Executive Director of Comp-U-Dopt.'

b'Demand for energy is existential. It is clear that future energy supply will come from many different sources in addition to hydrocarbons. b'Press Release: @KocOfficial awards Halliburton integrated offshore services contract \xe2\x80\x93 the first offshore project in Kuwait since the early 1980s.
.
.
.
\xe2\x80\x9cWe are grateful for the opportunity to collaborate with KOC and implement our integrated services to accelerate offshore development, reduce drilling and completions costs and increase recovery through the utilization of our innovative technologies,\xe2\x80\x9d said Halliburton Eastern Hemisphere President Joe Rainey.
.
.
.
Halliburton and KOC sign integrated services agreement for the offshore development of KOC\xe2\x80\x99s six HPHT wells in the Arabian Gulf in Al Ahmadi. Pictured left to right: Halliburton Eastern Hemisphere President Joe Rainey, KOC CEO Emad Mahmoud Sultan, KOC Deputy CEO Drilling and Technology Nayef Al-Enezi and KOC CEO Exploration and Gas Ahmed Al-Eidan.'

b'1 out of 4 children in our community is at risk for hunger.
